operations.summary: Retrieve all Tags
operations.notes: the tags are paginated, sorted by priority-field (lowest first)

parameters.name: pagesize
parameters.description: Set pagesize=[0-9]* to specify number of results to display per page (defaults to 10)

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Set page=[0-9]* to retrieve a (1-indexed) specific page of results (defaults to 1)

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: Set filter=all|frontpage|tiles|menu to fetch only those tags which appear on the

parameters.name: extendfirstitems
parameters.description: set yes to extend tags with their first contentitems

parameters.name: extendtemplates
parameters.description: Set yes to extend tags with their first contentitems

operations.summary: Create a new Tag

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Tag object that needs to be added

parameters.name: tag
parameters.description: Id or slug of the retuned Tag

parameters.description: set yes to extend tags with their first contentitems

parameters.description: Set yes to extend tags with their first contentitems

operations.summary: Delete an existing Tag given the id or slug

parameters.name: _id
parameters.description: Id of the retuned Tag

operations.summary: Update an existing Tag given the id or slug

parameters.name: tag
parameters.description: Id of the retuned Tag

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Tag object that needs to be updated

operations.summary: Synchronize a Tag by id or slug
operations.notes: A response is returned immediately, and the synchronization scheduled to be executed immediately, but there will be a delay before the tag and its related contentitems are actually updated. The field tag.synced will change when the synchronization has completed.

parameters.name: tag
parameters.description: Id of the retuned Tag

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Tag object that needs to be updated

operations.summary: Retrieve all Contentitems
operations.notes: the contentItems are paginated, sorted by the bond priority

parameters.name: trimitems
parameters.description: Set yes to omit remote content from each item

parameters.name: skipcache
parameters.description: Set yes to skip the local cache and fetch content directly from source (slow); only relevant when trimitems=no

parameters.name: pubfrom
parameters.description: Set [0-9]* to retrieve contentitems published after the given UNIX timestamp

parameters.name: pubto
parameters.description: Set [0-9]* to retrieve contentitems published before the given UNIX timestamp

parameters.name: sortby
parameters.description: Set upvotes|downvotes|views|priority to sort by most upvoted, most downvoted, most viewed or in order of appearance in the tag (default value is priority)

parameters.name: extendtags
parameters.description: Set yes to extend nested tag stubs with full objects (default value="yes")

parameters.name: extendtemplates
parameters.description: Set yes to extend nested template stubs with full objects (default value="yes"; only works in tandem with extendtags=yes)

operations.summary: Retrieve paginated Contenttypes, sorted by name
operations.notes: the contentItems are paginated, sorted by the bond priority

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Set page=[0-9]* to retrieve a (1-indexed) specific page of results (defaults to 1)

parameters.name: skipcache
parameters.description: Set pagesize=[0-9]* to specify number of results to display per page (defaults to 10)

apis.description: Calls concerning authentification of a User

operations.summary: Authenticate as a User
operations.notes: Server will respond with a challenge (public key) that needs to be verified in a login call.

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: username string a-z (lowercase)

apis.description: Calls concerning logging in for a User

operations.summary: Log in as a User
operations.type: Server will respond with a challenge (public key) that needs to be verified in a login call.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: A generated SHA-256 hash string

operations.summary: Validate a specific Access Token

parameters.name: token
parameters.description: A Token string for validation

operations.summary: Renew a specific Access Token

parameters.name: token
parameters.description: A Token string for renewal

operations.summary: Get a specific Access Token if it does exist

parameters.name: token
parameters.description: A Token string

operations.summary: Get a specific User data if he/she does exist

operations.summary: Get all Users list
Create a new User

operations.notes: The User will not be allowed to log in

operations.summary: Enable access for a specific User
operations.notes: The User will be allowed to log in

parameters.description: id string for the User

items.description: An array of the tags default ordered by the tags priority field
An array of the contentItems default ordered by the bond priority

priority.description: The priority of the tag (low to hight)

description.description: The short punchline for the tag

template.description: A template item defining the color scheme of the tile

name.description: The Name of the tag used with a # in fornt of it in the tile

slug.description: the Unique URL for the tag

imageSource.description: The default background image of the tile

image.description: The background image of the tile

Meta_Item.description: Anything can be fitted into this object

contentItems.description: An array of the contentitems in the tag
